channel.title: Problem with unlocking the bootloader
channel.description:
Hello to everyone !!!!!
I don't know if this is the right section to post but ,I have an Archos Access 45 4g device with android Nougat 7.0. I'm trying to unclock the bootloader but when I run "fastboot oem device-info" or "fastboot oem unlock" I get three dots that waiting forever ! I have already enabled the option "Oem Unlock" from Developer options. Still getting those dots that you see in the picture below! ![Screenshot_2019-07-28_20-59-09|660x466](upload://8oX4KeQELBfjmgd3z9egUq2O5Uq.png) Does anyone have a solution ?
Thank you very much !!!!!

item.title: Problem with unlocking the bootloader
item.dc:creator: system
item.description:
This topic was automatically closed after 30 days. New replies are no longer allowed.

Read full topic

item.title: Problem with unlocking the bootloader

item.description:
Hello to everyone !!!
